statements: DELETE FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM GreenhouseEnvironment WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01' AND humidity > 70 OR temperature < 25;
DELETE FROM greenhouse_environment_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM plant_growth_data WHERE growth_rate < 0.5 AND growth_stage = 'vegetative';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 123 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM greenhouse_environment WHERE temperature < 25 OR humidity > 70;
